con:part.con:content: <application xmlns="http://wadl.dev.java.net/2009/02" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <grammars/> <resources base="http://localhost:8094/logicaldoc/services/rest/bookmark"> <resource path="/"> <resource path="bookmarkDocument"> <method name="GET"> <request> <param name="docId" style="query" type="xs:long"/> </request> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="bookmarkFolder"> <method name="GET"> <request> <param name="folderId" style="query" type="xs:long"/> </request> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="deleteBookmark"> <method name="DELETE"> <request> <param name="bookmarkId" style="query" type="xs:long"/> </request> <response status="204"/> </method> </resource> <resource path="getBookmarks"> <method name="GET"> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="saveBookmark"> <method name="POST"> <request> <representation mediaType="application/xml"/> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </request> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="unbookmarkDocument"> <method name="DELETE"> <request> <param name="docId" style="query" type="xs:long"/> </request> <response status="204"/> </method> </resource> <resource path="unbookmarkFolder"> <method name="DELETE"> <request> <param name="folderId" style="query" type="xs:long"/> </request> <response status="204"/> </method> </resource> </resource> </resources> </application>
